item.description:
Hello all and regards from Germany!!

The EURO PROVIDENCE MEETUP GROUP is getting together to watch the Champions League Final at Fat Belly's pub on May 19th at 1.30 p.m. and Niko, the wonderful organizer of Euro Providence suggested we put our two groups together - the more the merrier, right? Unfortunately I will not be able to attend as I will still be in Europe at that time, but if you are interested to go, go ahead and sign up on our page or register with Euro Providence and sign up through them. Either way is fine. I will let Niko know who and how many of us are attending.

Go and cheer the Bavarians to win!!!! Watching a soccer game with a bunch of Europeans sounds like fun to me!!

Regards from Germany!

Hanna
